descriptions.overview: Proudly made in Wisconsin, Johnson's Structo-Cast® levels are great for small DIY jobs and offer some unique benefits over our aluminum levels - they're non-conductive, they won't mar painted surfaces, and they're our lightest weight levels.
list: Durable easy-read acrylic vials are impact-resistant
Frame is non-conductive and will not scratch fine wood or painted surfaces

reviews.title: "I does we it is supposed to do"
reviews.text: Would I buy it again, No I already have one. Just kidding.  I like the idea that it is a longer level so when trying to hang pictures you are pretty much covered with only oneself.  What I did not think about are all the small walls I needed it for as well. Here is an example of what I mean.  One picture is the level on the floor at the spot I needed I needed to use it. the other is what I was trying to hang.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Not too big and not too small."
reviews.text: The price is right and it seems to be accurate enough for what I am doing. I used it to install molding and some other wood trim and am getting ready to install a tile back splash in my kitchen.
reviews.author: Martha

reviews.title: "Basic product, good price"
reviews.text: I bought this for a basement flooring job. I wanted a basic unit, nothing fancy. This worked well for the task. It is lightweight, easy to use, made in America. For the price I feel it is a great product.
reviews.author: Nancyj123

reviews.title: "Did its job, lightweight"
reviews.text: Lightweight and has bubbles!
reviews.author: Danny

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: hami

reviews.title: "Level is true!"
reviews.text: This level has three sight bulbs of different angles and they're all very true to the angle. The air bubble inside the bulb is perfect in length for the alignment lines on the bulbs. Very easy to read and use!
reviews.author: Cheeze

reviews.title: "Inexpensive level"
reviews.text: This is an inexpensive plastic level ideal for inside work like hanging pictures.  It does not mark painted walls.
reviews.author: Wayne

reviews.title: "Cheap"
reviews.text: It's a cheap level.  What can I say you get what you pay for.  Okay for light use only.
reviews.author: Clay

reviews.title: "Johnson 24 inch level"
reviews.text: It serves it's purpose, but to be honest I only purchased it because the kobalt 24 inch was out of stock.
reviews.author: Clint

reviews.title: "I-beam Level"
reviews.text: This was a very cheap level. I used to make sure my post were level for my fence. It did the job just like any other level would. If I need another level I would definitely buy again because of the price and functionality.
reviews.author: Adolfo

reviews.title: "Solid Level"
reviews.text: Picked this up to help level out my landscaping edgers. It is a quality low budget tool that helped me get the job done. I like the 3 different level bubbles so it can be used for other projects around the house.
reviews.author: PhilL

reviews.title: "Johnson Level 24-in-1 Beam Level"
reviews.text: I would definitely purchase something like this regarding the installation of a garage door opener, etc.  Perfect solution regarding a 6 foot or longer expansion on anything of length!  Amen!Happy New Year!
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "Good value for the money"
reviews.text: I bought this to erect my gazebo. It was more than I expected for the money. It is plastic but good quality with nice straight edges and lightweight.  Should last me for a long while.
reviews.author: bigqd

reviews.title: "Level"
reviews.text: I bought this level for a small brick patio job for my garbage cans. I worked well and I can now use it for other jobs around the house. You can't beat the price for the quality
reviews.author: JEM

reviews.title: "Inexpensive level"
reviews.text: This black plastic level is lightweight and sturdy with three levels, it did the job. I wish it had measurements along the spine to double it's utility. Good for the price.
reviews.author: Houston

reviews.title: "24 in 1 Level"
reviews.text: I purchased this as I was upgrading my workshop and needed a level capable of fitting into the smaller spaces. This product was perfect for the task.
reviews.author: Cindy

reviews.title: "Great inexpensive level"
reviews.text: For the casual home repair or occasional user, this level is a great value. Light weight, accurate, & seems quite sturdy considering the price.
reviews.author: Ekho

reviews.title: "Works as advertised"
reviews.text: I've been using this on a garage shelving project. It works as you'd expect. Pretty durable. I've dropped it on concrete quite a few times.
reviews.author: waternchlorine

reviews.title: "Quality tool at a great price"
reviews.text: A very nice level with the “Johnson” name.  I was pleased with the price that I paid, and very pleased with it's weight and performance .
reviews.author: PFid

reviews.title: "It does the Job."
reviews.text: It's a level, it does what its suppose too. Average homeowner use. Construction guys might want to give a little beefier level.
reviews.author: bsn001

reviews.title: "Basic Level - does the kob"
reviews.text: Very good basic level. Only improvement would be a slot on one edge to allow for a look at the center level from the top.
reviews.author: Taglong5

reviews.title: "Good level at a reasonable price"
reviews.text: I can't fault this level at this price. It is made of plastic and so may get scarred up over time but it does the job.
reviews.author: Butch

reviews.title: "Not worth the bargain"
reviews.text: It was cheapest one they had and it held up to its worth.  Was warped within 2.5 hours of working in the sun.
reviews.author: Michael

reviews.title: "surprise!"
reviews.text: There are no measurement marks on this level.First one I have ever seen without them. Get a different one.
reviews.author: sarge

reviews.title: "Simple starter"
reviews.text: Gets it done son... starter gift for my brother- he loves it! Everyone can use an extra one of these:)
reviews.author: Ab1

reviews.title: "No fuss Level"
reviews.text: Great small level for any homeowner. Lightweight, easy to handle. Goes where heavier 4ft levels can't.
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "johnson level"
reviews.text: This level is excellent. It's really convenient and light to carry. would highly recommend this item.
reviews.author: Tino

reviews.title: "Weekend warrior necessity!"
reviews.text: You can't do any work involving straight lines without a level. This one will fill all your needs!
reviews.author: Beverly

reviews.title: "Simple and sturdy"
reviews.text: Light weight and very sturdy.Would definitely recommend for types of jobs.And very affordable.
reviews.author: DN

reviews.title: "Great price and product"
reviews.text: Great product for half the price of the other brands. Does the same job as any other level.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Nice little level"
reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. Cheap enough that I don't care if I lose it or if it gets broken.
reviews.author: Schutte

reviews.title: "Ok for the money"
reviews.text: Works as advertised but it would be nice to have measurements on it like a ruler as well
reviews.author: Terry

reviews.title: "Good"
reviews.text: Used it to level out my outdoor patio tiles, was very efficient and easy to use.
reviews.author: Daphne

reviews.title: "Johnson level"
reviews.text: It was just what I needed to hang two pictures side by side! Good price too!
reviews.author: Janice

reviews.title: "24 in level"
reviews.text: Great product! I even dropped it a few times and it took it it like a champ!
reviews.author: Fro

reviews.title: "Awesome for the price"
reviews.text: Great level especially for the price. I won't have to worry about breaking.
reviews.author: Chuck

reviews.title: "Level on a budget"
reviews.text: Bought this to have an extra medium sized level. Performs as it should.
reviews.author: Joe254

reviews.title: "Simple and light"
reviews.text: Got this for a super great deal and it does what it's suppose to do.
reviews.author: Phil

reviews.title: "Level"
reviews.text: This level is just the right size for the project we have.  Love it
reviews.author: lovelowes

reviews.title: "2 ft level"
reviews.text: it is true and it was not real expensive perfect to hang pictures!
reviews.author: thepictureman

reviews.text: Very accurate and a good value.  Light, easy yo read, U like it.
reviews.author: Griff

reviews.title: "Great Product for the price"
reviews.text: Overall really happy with it.  Lightweight- easy to use and see.
reviews.author: Sarah

reviews.title: "Level 24”"
reviews.text: This level is very level and has provided a level playing field.
reviews.author: ThirdCoastSurfer

reviews.title: "Johnson 24" level works fine"
reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive level, and this fit the bill very well.
reviews.author: Allen

reviews.title: "Great for a cheap level"
reviews.text: This worked great, was light, and easy to use! Price was great.
reviews.author: Cortney

reviews.title: "Johnson Level"
reviews.text: works great very light so it's easy to use in higher places
reviews.author: Whit

reviews.title: "Good, cheap level"
reviews.text: Perfect for around the house, hanging pictures and such.
reviews.author: ToyotaGuy88

reviews.title: "Great Level"
reviews.text: Awesome level and straight edge! Use this thing daily.
reviews.author: Brad

reviews.title: "Inexpensive and good quality"
reviews.text: The level was inexpensive and does what it suppose to
reviews.author: Fausto
